properties.name: telegram.path
properties.description: Base path for Telegram webhooks.

properties.name: telegram.chatid
properties.description: Chat ID for the main Telegram channel or group.

properties.name: telegram.groupid
properties.description: Group ID for a specific Telegram group.

properties.name: telegram.grouptitle
properties.description: Title of the Telegram group.

properties.name: telegram.bot.client.token
properties.description: API token for the client Telegram bot.

properties.name: telegram.bot.client.username
properties.description: Username for the client Telegram bot.

properties.name: telegram.bot.client.path
properties.description: Webhook path for the client Telegram bot.

properties.name: telegram.bot.admin.token
properties.description: API token for the admin Telegram bot.

properties.name: telegram.bot.admin.username
properties.description: Username for the admin Telegram bot.

properties.name: telegram.bot.admin.path
properties.description: Webhook path for the admin Telegram bot.

properties.name: app.url
properties.description: Domain URL of the application.

properties.name: encryption.service.key
properties.description: Encryption key for sensitive data.

properties.name: scheduler.autosendmessage.appurl
properties.description: URL of the application that will send the webhook.

properties.name: scheduler.autosendmessage.active
properties.description: Indicates if the auto-send message scheduler is active.

properties.name: scheduler.autosendmessage.chatid
properties.description: Chat ID for the Telegram channel or group where messages will be sent.

properties.name: scheduler.autosendmessage.time
properties.description: Time interval in seconds between message sends.

properties.name: scheduler.autosendmessage.message
properties.description: Message content that will be sent automatically.

properties.name: wireguard.server.name
properties.description: Name the Wireguard Server Interface'

properties.name: wireguard.server.address
properties.description: URL or IP address of the Wireguard server

properties.name: wireguard.server.port
properties.description: Wireguard server listening port

properties.name: wireguard.server.publicKey
properties.description: Wireguard server public key
